org.apache.accumulo.server

Class AccumuloServerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.core.client.impl.ClientContext
      • org.apache.accumulo.server.AccumuloServerContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Master, SimpleGarbageCollector, TabletServer

    public class AccumuloServerContext
extends ClientContext
    Provides a server context for Accumulo server components that operate with the system credentials and have access to the system files and configuration.
Shall be called with ProblemReports, AuditedSecurityOperation, SecurityOperation, ClientServiceHandler, ProblemReportingIterator, CloseWriteAheadLogReferences, MetaDataStateStore, Compactor, ReplicationUtil, RootTabletStateStore, WorkMaker, FileManager, ServerConfigurationFactory, AuthenticationTokenSecretManager.
